E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 5/13/1973
Subject: Progress of Derrel Thomas
Dear Sir,
Derrel Thomas has nothing more to prove at A Greenwood Braves!
He has an AVG of .348 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 5/15/1973
Subject: Progress of Gary Lance
Dear Sir,
Gary Lance has an ERA of 0.41 at AA Savannah Braves!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/16/1973
Subject: I am a starter...
... so would you please put me in the rotation?
I want to go out there and start for my
team. Please come on, manager!

Regards,
Dick Kelley



Date: Friday, 5/17/1973
Subject: Progress of Ralph Garcia
Dear Sir,
Ralph Garcia has an ERA of 2.91 at A Greenwood Braves!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Saturday, 5/18/1973
Subject: Extension?
Dear Sir,
I am really enjoying playing for your team.
I would be interested in a contract extension!
How about you?

Regards,
Gene Stone

Dear Sir,
